Package chess.interfaces

Interface IChessPiece

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, IChessboardSquare, IGhost
All Known Implementing Classes:
Bishop, ChessPiece, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public interface IChessPiece extends IChessboardSquare, IGhost, Cloneable

  • Method Details

    • toFen

      char toFen()
      Gets the fen-representation of the chess piece type and its team.

    • movementInfo

      IChessMoveInfo[] movementInfo()
      Gets the information of the moves the chess piece is capable of. See IChessMoveInfo for more information.

    • promotable

      boolean promotable()
      Determines whether a chess piece is allowed to be promoted to another chess piece.

    • setPosition

      void setPosition(IChessboardSquare square)
      Sets the square the chess piece is on.

    • team

      int team()
      Gets the team, also known as the color, of the chess piece. The number 0 represents the color black, whereas the number 1 represents the color white.
      Returns:
      An integer that is either 0 or 1.
